channel.title: 5 ways to make RuneScape fun again!
channel.description:
I know, most of us have been there: Runescape is boring. So I thought Id post a few ways that helped me get back into it, of course without much boredom.
[b]1.[/b] Try a new skill, if you're a combat person take up Slaying. Slaying WILL challenge you, but in a fun way and will take you places and fight things you normally wouldn't
[b]2.[/b] Play with a friend. Go play with a friend, adventure places you normally wouldn't alone. Using loot share can make playing much funner as greed kicks in you wont stop until something good drops.
[b]3.[/b] Play music while you play, this can relax you while you play.
[b]4.[/b] GRAPHICS! Get a new Runescape-related background or cursor this can make playing more enjoyable.
[b]5.[/b] Most importantly, TAKE BREAKS. Taking breaks insures that you don't get too bored.
[quote="mapu"][b]6.[/b] Open up Runescape Classic F2P[/quote] That too. :D ^^^^
I hope this helps some of you out there.
~ Val ~

[/quote]

Anyway, none of these steps could possibly make RuneScape fun again for me. The game itself is boring, music can’t change that. I am being serious when I say that I would rather play any other game in existence, than RuneScape. Even MW2.[/quote]I released Alien Attack. You sure you want to stand by that statement?
